I would hold onto it forever. It is probably special.



-----Original Message-----
From: Lomack [mailto:lomack@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 7:16 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Rune of Arrest


From: Lomack <lomack@...>

Has anyone seen a Rune of Arrest before?

I found this thing on a vendor in Kaladim for 3 plat, but I can't find
any
mention of what spell its for. Anyone have any clues.

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
